tool_description: Analyzes potential drug-drug interactions between patient's current medications and investigational study drugs, assessing safety risks and eligibility implications.

study_drugs.description: Investigational drugs or treatments in the clinical trial

interaction_severity.description: Minimum severity level to report (minor, moderate, major, contraindicated)

error_messages: Invalid medication format: All medications must be valid drug names or generic/brand name combinations.
Unrecognized study drug: One or more study_drugs are not found in the interaction database.
Invalid severity level: interaction_severity must be one of [minor, moderate, major, contraindicated].
Empty medication lists: Both current_medications and study_drugs must contain at least one medication.
usage: Provide arrays of current medications and study drugs. Set interaction_severity threshold to control which interactions are reported. The tool identifies all significant interactions.

interaction_found.description: Whether any drug interactions were identified

interaction_details.description: Detailed descriptions of each identified interaction
